title: Secret Cleared Software Engineer NEW!
full_description: A large government integrator in the Colorado Springs Area is seeking a Software Engineer to join their team in located in the Cheyenne Mountain Complex. As a Software Engineer you will be responsible for the software support to Delivery Orders. You will ensure that cost, schedule and technical performance comply with program needs.Must Haves:- 4+ years’ experience of as a Software Engineer using JAVA- Active Secret Clearance- Experience developing JavaPlusses:- DoD 8570 Compliance- Experience with relational database management systems and tools (ORACLE, PL/SQL, JDBC).- Bachelor’s Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics (STEM)
